

## About the GEO transcriptomics dataset explorer
### Dataset information

This Shiny App is for searching and visulizating the quality of a list of selected NCBI GEO datasets, from [NCBI Gene Expression Omnibus](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/)

![][logo1]  ![][logo_geo]

### NOTE

R functions for retriving the GEO datasets are not provided in *this Shiny* application
